content.webTitle: Andrei Lugovoi talks to the Guardian's Luke Harding

fields.headline: Andrei Lugovoi talks to the Guardian's Luke Harding
fields.bodyText: In an exclusive interview with our Moscow correspondent, Andrei Lugovoi gives a detailed account of the day that Alexander Litvinenko was poisoned in London. Lugovoi denies being involved, and instead says that Litvinenko was in the pay of the UK security services.
